snippet: In a speech, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. said Iraq had halted the momentum of Islamic State fighters with help from the United States and regional allies.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph Biden declares that Iraq has halted momentum of Islamic State militants with help from United States and regional allies.
lead_paragraph: In a speech, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. said Iraq had halted the momentum of Islamic State fighters with help from the United States and regional allies.

headline.main: Biden Cites Progress in Iraq’s War With ISIS
headline.print_headline: Biden Cites Gains in Iraq’s War With ISIS
